name: Fruity Snake
description:
Fruity Snake

By Alyssa Montgomery

A snake remake developed for the Text Only Jam 2 by 8 Bits to Infinity.

"An open challenge to create a game prototype where the visuals are only text (letters, numbers, and standard symbols)."

Theme: Start Small

https://itch.io/jam/text-only-jam-2
